title: The Truth About My Success
description: Paloma Rose is living the dream. A TV star and Teen Icon, she has everything most girls could ever want. On the other side of town, Dona Ginness is far from living the dream as you can get without actually being in a nightmare.Normally the paths of Paloma and Dona would never cross. But there is one thing that draws their lives together. They look so much alike they could be twins.And that's how it all begins...
author: Dyan Sheldon
